name:
Mario & Luigi: Bowser's
Inside Story:  Update
description:
An update for Mario & Luigi™: Bowser’s Inside Story + Bowser Jr.’s Journey is now available from Nintendo eShop.
All customers who own a copy of Mario & Luigi™: Bowser’s Inside Story + Bowser Jr.’s Journey should download the update. This will update the software to Version 1.2 with the following amendments:

- Various bugs have been fixed in order to provide a smoother gaming experience.

• Once the update has been downloaded, it will be installed automatically.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused, and recommend downloading this update to ensure a smooth game experience.
